2013 Authors PDF PDF Plus bookmark abstract Abstract Hannah Webster Foster s The Coquette performs the ideological task of quelling women s grievances against marriage in order to conserve social stability more broadly The novel s sustained denigration of passion and fancy deprives female readers of the means by which to register their dissatisfaction and to imagine alternative social relations 2013 by The New England Quarterly Thomas J Joudrey Thomas J Joudrey is a doctoral candidate in Victorian literature at Pennsylvania State University https doi org 10 1162 TNEQ_a_00257
